pullRequest.title: protect RNG with mutex

nodes.bodyText: Consider guarding only the random call, log might be expensive.
add const to signal that it does not change during the lifetime of the object.

commit.message:
tighten guard holding

also:
* constify where possible
* use uniform_real_distribution to invert range for us

nodes.bodyText: I assume reversing of the arguments was intentional .....
